name: Ограничение Z_Dinord_Assigned_Task_Only
script:
user_email = frappe.db.get_value("User", frappe.session.user, "email")
user = frappe.get_doc('User', frappe.session.user)
user_roles = [i.role for i in user.roles]
if "Z_Dinord_Assigned_Task_Only" in user_roles:
    conditions = """ owner = '%s' or _assign like '%%%s%%' """ % (user_email, user_email)
